title: In case of reservation area less than or equal to 5 ha, additional BUA equal to area of the plot so
clause_text: In case of reservation area less than or equal to 5 ha, additional BUA equal to area of the plot so transferred to MCGM/Appropriate Authority, free of cost and free of encumbrances, shall be permissible over and above the permissible FSI as per regulation 30(A), except in respect of proposals under Regulation No 33(5), 33(7), 33(7)(A), 33(8), 33(9), 33(9)(A), 33(9)(B), 33(10),
section: General conditions to allow development under above regulations:-
